PHRASE.LANG: Bored of having the same old teeth? Give these gnashers a try. Great as part of a costume, or just to make a statement! [#Legal]
Lassé d'avoir les même dents? Essayez ces chicots. Parfaite pièce pour un costume, ou juste pour le fun! [#Legal]
Hast du deine alten Zähne satt? Dann probier mal diese Beißerchen aus. Perfekt zu jedem Kostüm oder auch einfach so! [#Legal]
Non ti piacciono più i tuoi vecchi denti? Prova questa dentatura. Fantastica come parte di un costume o solo per farti notare! [#Legal]
¿Te has cansado llevar siempre los mismos dientes? Pues échale un vistazo a estos piños. ¡Son perfectos para cualquier disfraz o para expresarte de otra manera! [#Legal]
いつもの歯は見飽きましたか？コスチュームと一緒だと２倍おもしろい！ [#Legal]
매일 똑같은 이빨에 질렸다구요? 이런 독특한 이빨을 사용해보세요. 의상의 일부로도 굉장하지만, 그냥 자신을 표현하기에도 좋으니까요! [#Legal]
Bored of having the same old teeth? Give these gnashers a try. Great as part of a costume, or just to make a statement! [#Legal]
想換牙嗎？試試這一套吧。除了搭衣服外也能展現自我！ [#Legal]
想換牙嗎？試試這一套吧。除了搭衣服外也能展現自我！ [#Legal]
Bored of having the same old teeth? Give these gnashers a try. Great as part of a costume, or just to make a statement! [#Legal]
